miniapp.name: Loom
miniapp.subtitle: Weave your rhythm.
miniapp.description: Type anything and Loom turns your keystroke timing into a woven pattern. Save a daily weave, revisit last 7 days, and copy the textile as PNG.
miniapp.ogDescription: Type anything and Loom turns your keystroke timing into a woven pattern. Save a daily weave, revisit last 7 days, and copy the textile as PNG.
